longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  5 years) National ID Cards.
- Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  5 years) passports. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of France.
  

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Reunion will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Reunion are expected to hold
  their own travel document
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year. Recommended
  prevention: C.
